pages.text: $(bred)Ladder Zombie$() picked the ladder up for $8.99.$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)65$()$(br)$(bred)Door Health$() : $(l)250$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Low$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It can put its ladder on $(l)defender plants$() and all type of plant with $(l)pumpkin defence$() to $(bred)make them unavailable$().
